message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I'll get a bit more since I made the first offer
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about we try something closer to the middle?
I'll try to meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more since the money is losing value for me
Look, I want to be fair, but this back and forth isn't helping either of us. Let's just split it down the middle and call it a day.
